titleStmt.title: Mr Thomas Coriat to his friends in England sendeth greeting from Agra the capitall city of the dominion of the great Mogoll in the Easterne India, the last of October, 1616. Thy trauels and thy glory to ennamell, with fame we mount thee on the lofty cammell; ... .
titleStmt.author: Coryate, Thomas, ca. 1577-1617.

titleStmt.title: Mr Thomas Coriat to his friends in England sendeth greeting from Agra the capitall city of the dominion of the great Mogoll in the Easterne India, the last of October, 1616. Thy trauels and thy glory to ennamell, with fame we mount thee on the lofty cammell; ... .
titleStmt.author: Coryate, Thomas, ca. 1577-1617.
Taylor, John, 1580-1653.

notesStmt.note: Edited, with miscellaneous verses on Coryate by I.T., i.e. John Taylor.
Signatures: [par].⁴ A⁴ a⁴ B-E⁴ (-[par].1 and E4, blank?).

Leaf a3v is blank and a4 has a woodcut (as on A3v, C4v) on the recto and superscription on the verso; a variant has superscription on a3v and a4 blank. Imperfect: leaves A2,3 and C4 lacking, supplied by photostat from Penrose copy.
Reproduction of the original in the Folger Shakespeare Library.
